short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A wallet for access to the ikarus platform and multi-chain crypto wallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description: 
 
The first ever Ikarus extension to help in managing supply chain and logistics operations through blockchain. Explore the capabilities of the Ikarus Smart Logistics blockchain directly through your browser with the Ikarus Wallet. Our user-friendly Chrome extension gives you seamless access to features of Ikarus platform, including sending and receiving Ikarus tokens, signing transactions, managing smart contracts, and much more. 
 
The Ikarus Wallet was designed with both simplicity and functionality in mind, making it easy for individuals and companies alike to engage with the Ikarus blockchain through this extension. 
 
Key Features: 
 
Ikarus Token Transactions: effortlessly manage, send, and receive tokens with Ikarus Wallet. 
 
Smart Contract Interaction: sign and deploy smart contracts securely on Ikarus blockchain. 
 
Subwallet Creation: easily create subwallets within your main wallet for organized management of tokens. 
 
Transaction Signing: ensure safe interaction with the Ikarus platform with our secure interface for transaction signing.    
 
Blockchain Integration: connect directly to the Ikarus blockchain using our wallet, bringing the power of the network to your fingertips.
